description:
A Shopping List with reminders, price tracking and list sharing.
A privacy-focused, offline-first shopping list application built with modern Android architecture. No internet connection required, no tracking, no ads - just your shopping lists stored securely on your device.

CORE FEATURES

• Multiple Shopping Lists - Organize items by store, occasion, or category
• Smart Item Management - Add, edit, and reorder items with drag-and-drop
• Purchase Tracking - Check off items as you shop with visual indicators
• Quantity & Pricing - Track quantities and prices with automatic total calculation
• Item Reminders - Set date/time reminders for shopping trips
• List Sharing - Export and share lists as .shoppinglist files
• Quick Rename - Double-tap any list to rename it instantly
• Offline Storage - All data stored locally using Room database

This application is perfect for anyone who values privacy, offline functionality, and straightforward design. No unnecessary features, no bloat - just a reliable shopping list that works exactly as expected.
